thread.title: The Rock and his team created the world’s largest 7-layered dip (3 Photos)
thread.title_full: The Rock and his team created the world’s largest 7-layered dip (3 Photos)

author: Travis
title: The Rock and his team created the world’s largest 7-layered dip (3 Photos)
text:
Instagram 
Dwayne “The Rock” Johnson is not a newcomer to holding world records , but this time is a step above the rest. 
Just before Super Bowl 51, The Rock and his production team were recognized for making the world’s largest 7-layer dip . The previous record weighed in at a staggering 440.925 pounds. 2 Guinness World Records 
It took the team of four a total of five hours to fill a 100-gallon fish tank. The 7-layer dip was made using 153.6 pounds of refried beans, 76.8 quarts of sour cream, 9.6 pounds of seasoning, 76.8 pounds of cheese, 38.5 quarts of guac, 38.4 quarts of tomatoes, 19.2 quarts of green onion, and 37.2 quarts of black olives. The dip weighed a mind-blowing 540 pounds. 
After achieving the record the dip was donated to the Midnight Mission Homeless Shelter in Los Angeles, California. 3
